askAQuestionAboutTheWebPage.displayName: Ask a Question About the Web Page
askAQuestionAboutTheWebPage.description: Gets an answer to a question about a given webpage.

extractStructuredData.description: Returns structured data fields extracted from the webpage using an LLM model.

getAccountInformation.description: Get account usage information including remaining API credits and concurrent requests.

getPageHtml.description: Retrieves the raw HTML markup of a web page.

scrapeWebsiteText.description: Returns the visible text content of a webpage specified by the URL.
